item.title: How do i
item.dc:creator: @Xx_R_A_G_3_R Xx R A G 3 R
item.description:
@Xx_R_A_G_3_R wrote:

How do i make it so it wont delete my item (i set it up like food) Its a healing thing, but i dont want it to delete ill show you what i did with it coding-wise, tell me what i must modify/remove to make it not delete if(myHP <= 99) { heal = 99; hitDiff = -heal; myHP += heal; updateRequired = true; hitUpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("You are healed to full Hitpoints."); setAnimation(720); } And heres what else i had to do with it case 2968: //Druidic Spell healing[1] = 99; healing[2] = 99; healing[3] = -1; break; so how do i make this not delete the item?

Read full topic
